metadata.title: CVE-2024-50183 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:scsi: lpfc: Ensure DA_ID handling completion before deleting an NPIVinstanceDeleting an NPIV instance requires all fabric ndlps to be released beforean NPIV's resources can be torn down.  Failure to release fabric ndlpsbeforehand opens kref imbalance race conditions.  Fix by forcing the DA_IDto complete synchronously with usage of wait_queue.
